# barTintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to the toolbar background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var barTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This color is made translucent by default unless you set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolbar/isTranslucent] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Changing the background

- **backgroundImage(forToolbarPosition:barMetrics:)**: Returns the image to use for the background in a given position and with given metrics.
- **setBackgroundImage(_:forToolbarPosition:barMetrics:)**: Sets the image to use for the background in a given position and with given metrics.
